/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
